name: A Couple Of Cubes Demo
description:
A Couple of Cubes is a co-op puzzle game set in a world of cubes. Progress through increasingly complex puzzles to escape the government facility that you are held in with the special abilities granted to your characters.

This current demo build requires a controller for player 2 and a keyboard and mouse for player 1.

Please fill out our questionnaire once you've finished the game to help us get some feedback:

https://forms.gle/V8zGMp3FvcJ8Gjuk7
